entities.description: The type of measurement unit used for substances.
Data that is unknown or marked as missing.
Number of valid responses or cases for the data measured.
Total number of responses or cases in the survey, including valid and missing data.
Range of possible values for the measurement data, including missing value codes.
Frequency or percentage distribution of each measurement unit used.

relationships.description: Indicates the type of measurement units used in the survey.
Indicates that some data in the survey is marked as unknown or missing.
Indicates the number of valid cases or responses in the survey.
Indicates the total number of cases or responses in the survey, including all types of data.
Specifies the range of values used for the measurement data.
Indicates the unweighted frequency or percentage distribution of each measurement unit used.
